sentences.english: "Hezhe" belongs to the language system of "Mundarin", It means "the oriental people".
sentences.chinese: “赫哲”是滿語，大意是指“東方的人們”。

sentences.english: A few others in Sanjiazi speak a bit of Manchu.
sentences.chinese: 三家子的只有一些村民會講少量的滿語。

sentences.english: Hanyu with the Manchu influence spread southward.
sentences.chinese: 受滿語影響的漢語遂向南傳播。

sentences.english: Manchu language education has been mainly in some universities abroad.
sentences.chinese: 在國外，滿語教學主要集中在部分大學。

sentences.english: About six years ago Sanjiazi set up the country's first Manchu school.
sentences.chinese: 大約六年前，在三家村成立了中國第一所滿語學校。

definition: alternative name/to refer to sth by another name/antonomasia
to transliterate/to transcribe/to transfer words onto a surface by direct contact (as with a decal)
slave-owning society (precedes feudal society 封建社會|封建社会 in Marxist theory)
radical of a compound word (in European language)
(old) to instruct the young/to teach a child to read and write/as easy as ABC
to be confused/to be at a loss/Taiwan pr. [fa1 meng2]
to run a newspaper/to publish a newspaper
